Only saw the original FMA up to Maes Hughe getting deaded.
But I saw all of brotherhood. 
I really liked Britherhood, the story was decent and had good twists and turns. But really the characters were great (even if some of them turning good was a little silly).
Should I watch the original? Keep in mind I know how it ends.
